sql.query:
SELECT salt AS saltvalue, user_tpin, id, md_id, ds_id
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND u_status = '1' AND blank2 = :P1 /* {{$_POST.username}} */

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countmdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.md_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.ds_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT username, api_password
FROM m_api
WHERE api_type = :P1 /* {{'UPI'}} */ AND status = 1

SELECT user_id
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */

values.value: {{'QR code request for Amount of Rs. '+$_POST.UPIAmount}}

sql.query:

'+$_POST.UPIAmount}} */, :P8 /* {{UPIUrl}} */, :P9 /* {{ReqID}} */, :P10 /* {{OrderId}} */, :P11 /* {{$_POST.api_id}} */, :P12 /* {{'UPI'}} */, :P13 /* {{'UPI Live Transaction'}} */, :P14 /* {{Response}} */, :P15 /* {{DBStatus}} */, :P16 /* {{NOW}} */)
